sentences.en: -- But thou wilt see her now with other eyes.
sentences.cn: —— 但现在你要用另一副目光来见她.

sentences.en: " Be quiet , Pearl -- thou understandest not these things,'said her mother.
sentences.cn: “ 别作声, 珠儿!你不明白这些事情, ”她母亲说.

sentences.en: " Thou must dwell no longer with this man,'said Hester, slowly and firmly.
sentences.cn: “ 你不能继续跟他住在一起了, ” 海丝特说, 语气徐缓而坚定.

sentences.en: " Who art thou that dares to hold such language? "
sentences.cn: “ 你是何人,竟敢口出狂言? ”

sentences.en: And dost thou go to meet him in the nighttime? "
sentences.cn: 你是在夜里去见他的 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: And, that thou mayest live, take off this draught. "
sentences.cn: 那么, 为了你可以活下去, 把这药吃下去. ”
在你打发我们走以前再请仔细考虑一下吧.

sentences.en: Breathe not the secret , above all, to the man thou wottest of.
sentences.cn: 别露一点口风, 尤其对你恋着的那个男人.
他说话总是显得自命清高。

sentences.en: I can't stand his holier-than-thou attitude.
sentences.cn: 我无法忍受他那种自命不凡的态度。

sentences.en: If thou so choose, it will bear thee back again.
sentences.cn: 只要你愿意, 它还可以把你再送回去.

sentences.en: Or , if not, thou strange and elfish child, whence didst thou come? "
sentences.cn: 要不是这样, 你这个怪里怪气的小妖精似的孩子是从哪儿来的? ”

sentences.en: The eighth commandment is "Thou shalt not steal".
Thou nor I have made the world.
sentences.cn: 创造这个世界的既不是你也不是我.

sentences.en: Thou-sands of local people lined the streets and clapped as the procession went by.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的当地居民站在街道两旁，为由此经过的队伍鼓掌。

trans.tran_en: a word meaning ‘you’, used as the subject of a sentence
